price: Ese ni iki cyatubuza kwemera Allah n’ukuri kwatugezeho (Qur’an), kandi twifuza ko Nyagasani wacu adushyira hamwe n’abantu b’intungane (mu ijuru)?
arabic: وَمَا لَنَا لَا نُؤۡمِنُ بِٱللَّهِ وَمَا جَآءَنَا مِنَ ٱلۡحَقِّ وَنَطۡمَعُ أَن يُدۡخِلَنَا رَبُّنَا مَعَ ٱلۡقَوۡمِ ٱلصَّٰلِحِينَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: wamā lanā lā nu'minu bil-lahi wamā jāanā mina al-ḥaqi wanaṭmaʿu an yud'khilanā rabbunā maʿa al-qawmi al-ṣāliḥīna
